title: Tensei Shitanode Tsugi Koso wa Shiawasena Jinsei wo Tsukande Misemashou - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Age Progression   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Easy Going Life   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Slow Romance
author: Saeki-san   佐伯さん
description:
After being hit by a car, she suddenly found herself in the afterlife… or so she thought, but for some reason she was reincarnated as a baby in another world?!

Lizbeth was raised by incredibly doting and beautiful parents, and using the knowledge from her former life she makes a goal to “have a moderately successful life” in this world.

However, her talent for magic is abnormal, and a prince, along with many other noble young men have either become infatuated with her, aim to kill her, or almost die… that isn’t “moderate” at all! But even so, she swears to obtain the happy life she envisioned, somehow!>
